scripts.build:ui: $(If(Test-Path build) {Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build} else {$true}) && Push-Location '~/Desktop/Projects/Full Stack Open 2020/part2/phonebook' && npm run build --prod && Pop-Location && Move-Item '~/Desktop/Projects/Full Stack Open 2020/part2/phonebook/build' build
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
